explanation: [0-0] The video shows a metal clip, slightly open, with a small ring at the end. The background is a yellow floor and a gray wall.

[0-3] A hand holds a section of stripped blue electrical wire, exposing the copper wire inside. The copper wire is inserted into the ring at the end of the clip, and then the pliers clamp the end of the clip, flattening the ring with the copper wire inside. A red cross appears on the screen.

[0-3] A hand holds a section of stripped blue electrical wire, exposing the copper wire inside. The copper wire is inserted into the ring at the end of the clip, and then the pliers clamp the end of the clip, flattening the ring with the copper wire inside. A red cross appears on the screen.

[0-3] A hand holds a section of stripped blue electrical wire, exposing the copper wire inside. The copper wire is inserted into the ring at the end of the clip, and then the pliers clamp the end of the clip, flattening the ring with the copper wire inside. A red cross appears on the screen.

[3-12] The scene changes, and the hand threads the stripped blue wire through the clip and back again, making a fold in the wire within the clip. Then, the protruding copper wire is inserted into the ring at the end of the clip, and the ring is flattened with pliers. Finally, the hand holds the clip with the wire in front of the screen, and a green check mark appears on the screen.
